NFC Project Hold tag against back of device to scan logo for app ARG ENTER You are not in the vicinity of the node\'s permanent location. something has gone wrong –\nwithin ten metres from node\nlinks you to the net\n\nverify network signal\nconfirm coordinates type here GLOBAL LOCAL 竜思念形態
//REPRESENTATION DISCLAIMER //IMPORTANT: THE DEFAULT TRUE VALUE REPRESENTS THE FINAL NODE, NODES ARE SET TRUE WHEN THE NEXT NODE IS TO BE UNLOCKED //this also helps mask the k/v pair in Shared Preferences from root tinkerers... but I'll implement Encrypted Shared Preferences in the future false //default values for Global BR to be stored in shared preferences false false false false false false false true
false //default values for Global BL to be stored in shared preferences false false false false false false true false

false //default values for Global CM to be stored in shared preferences false false false false true false false false
false //default values for Global CT to be stored in shared preferences false false false true false false false false
false //default values for Global TR to be stored in shared preferences false false true false false false false false
false //default values for Global TL to be stored in shared preferences false true false false false false false false
false //default values for Global ML to be stored in shared preferences true false false false false false false false
true //default values for Global MR to be stored in shared preferences false false false false false false false false
